Description:
IN/SEL/230222/RBR/01 - 312298131
failed to ensure that pedestrians and vehicles can circulate in a safe manner within your factory, namely you have failed to ensure suitable segregation or separation of pedestrians and vehicles including forklift trucks, within your workplace.

IN/SEL/230222/RBR/02 - 
You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as appropriate, for the effective control and monitoring of guarding arrangements to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery within your factory.
